title: Virginia: Three armed men on the run after hold up
text:
Three men armed with guns and a metal bar have robbed a pub in Adelaide's northern suburbs overnight.

They forced open the doors of the V Hotel gaming room on Old Port Wakefield Rd, Virginia just after 2am today.

Police said they threatened staff before stealing cash, but no one was injured.

One suspect is described as being "tall", while the other two are around 163cm with stocky builds.

The bandits, who were all wearing dark clothing, are still on the run.

media_camera A shattered glass door was removed this morning. Picture: AAP/Morgan Sette

ELIZABETH SOUTH PUB ROBBED

In a separate incident, three men forced their way into a closed pub on the Philip Hwy in Elizabeth South this morning.

They broke in about 5.10am and stole bottles of alcohol, police say.

The trio fled the scene when they were startled by a cleaner.

There is no indication the two incidents are related.

Anyone with information about these incidents is asked to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or online.
description: Three men armed with guns and a metal bar are on the run after robbing the gaming room of a northern hotel, while another pub was also targeted by three other males.
